00038 #include "egs_phsp_source.h"

00042 EGS_PhspSource::EGS_PhspSource(const string &phsp_file,
00043         const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(Name,f) {
00044     init(); openFile(phsp_file);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void EGS_PhspSource::init() {
00048     otype = "EGS_PhspSource";
00049     recl = 0; Xmin = -1e30; Xmax = 1e30; Ymin = -1e30; Ymax = 1e30;
00050     is_valid = false; record = 0; mode2 = false; swap_bytes = false;
00051     the_file_name = "no file"; filter_type = -1; particle_type = 2;
00052     description = "Invalid phase space source";
00053     Nread = 0; count = 0; Nrecycle = 0;
00054     Npos = 0; Nlast = 0;
00055     wmin = -1e30; wmax = 1e30;
00056     Nreuse_g = 1; Nreuse_e = 1; Nreuse = 1; Nuse = 2; first = true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void EGS_PhspSource::openFile(const string &phsp_file) {
00060     if( the_file.is_open() ) the_file.close();
00061     the_file_name = "no file"; is_valid = false; recl = 0;
00062     if( record ) { delete [] record; record = 0; }
00063     the_file.open(phsp_file.c_str(),ios::binary | ios::in);
00064     if( !the_file.is_open() ) {
00065         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: failed to open binary file %s"
00066                 " for reading\n",phsp_file.c_str()); return;
00067     }
00068     string cmode; char auxc;
00069     for(int i=0; i<5; i++) {
00070         the_file.get(auxc);
00071         if( the_file.eof() || !the_file.good() ) {
00072             egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: an I/O error occured "
00073                   "while reading the first record of %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00074             return;
00075         }
00076         cmode += auxc;
00077     }
00078     if( cmode == "MODE0" ) { mode2 = false; recl = 28; }
00079     else if( cmode == "MODE2" ) { mode2 = true; recl = 32; }
00080     else {
00081         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: the file %s is not a MODE0 or"
00082                 " MODE2 file\n",phsp_file.c_str()); return;
00083     }
00084     record = new char [recl];
00085     int n, n_photon; float emax, emin, pinc;
00086     the_file.read((char *) &n, sizeof(int));
00087     the_file.read((char *) &n_photon, sizeof(int));
00088     the_file.read((char *) &emax, sizeof(float));
00089     the_file.read((char *) &emin, sizeof(float));
00090     the_file.read((char *) &pinc, sizeof(float));
00091     if( the_file.eof() || !the_file.good() ) {
00092         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: an I/O error occured "
00093               "while reading the first record of %s\n",phsp_file.c_str());
00094         recl = 0; return;
00095     }
00096     swap_bytes = false;
00097     if( n <= 0 || n_photon < 0 || n_photon > n || emin < 0 || emax < 0 ||
00098         emax < emin || pinc < 0 ) {
00099         swap_bytes = true;
00100         egsSwapBytes(&n); egsSwapBytes(&n_photon); egsSwapBytes(&emin);
00101         egsSwapBytes(&emax); egsSwapBytes(&pinc);
00102         if( n <= 0 || n_photon < 0 || n_photon > n || emin < 0 || emax < 0 ||
00103             emax < emin || pinc < 0 ) {
00104             egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: phase space file header"
00105                " contains meaningless values with and without byte swaping:\n");
00106             if( n <= 0 ) egsWarning("  number of particles: %d\n",n);
00107             if( n_photon < 0 ) egsWarning("  number of photons: %d\n",n_photon);
00108             if( n_photon > n ) egsWarning("  number of photons (%d) is "
00109                  "greater than number of particles (%d)\n",n_photon,n);
00110             if( emin < 0 ) egsWarning("  minimum energy: %g\n",emin);
00111             if( emax < 0 ) egsWarning("  maximum energy: %g\n",emax);
00112             if( emin > emax ) egsWarning("  emin > emax: %g %g\n",emin,emax);
00113             if( pinc < 0 ) egsWarning("  incident particles: %g\n",pinc);
00114             recl = 0; return;
00115         }
00116     }
00117     // at this points we have passed a set of checks and think that
00118     // we have some meaningful information about number of particles, etc.
00119     // to be completely sure, it is a good idea to read the last particle
00120     // in the file and check for errors.
00121     istream::off_type nend = n; nend = nend*recl;
00122     //the_file.seekg(recl*n,ios::beg);
00123     the_file.seekg(nend,ios::beg);
00124     the_file.read(record,recl*sizeof(char));
00125     if( the_file.bad() || the_file.fail() ) {
00126         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::openFile: failed to read the last"
00127         " particle in the file, this indicates some unknown error condition\n");
00128         recl = 0; return;
00129     }
00130     the_file.clear(); the_file.seekg(recl,ios::beg);
00131     Npos = 0; Nlast = n; Nfirst = 1;
00132     // at this point the position should be at the first particle in the file
00133     Emax = emax; Emin = emin; Pinc = pinc; Nparticle = n; Nphoton = n_photon;
00134     is_valid = true; the_file_name = phsp_file;
00135 }
00136 
00137 EGS_PhspSource::EGS_PhspSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00138     EGS_BaseSource(input,f) {
00139     init();
00140     string fname; int err = input->getInput("phase space file",fname);
00141     if( err ) {
00142         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource: no 'phase space file' input\n");
00143         return;
00144     }
00145     openFile(fname);
00146     if( !isValid() ) {
00147         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource: errors while opening the phase space file"
00148               " %s\n",fname.c_str()); return;
00149     }
00150     vector<EGS_Float> cutout;
00151     err = input->getInput("cutout",cutout);
00152     if( !err && cutout.size() == 4 )
00153         setCutout(cutout[0],cutout[1],cutout[2],cutout[3]);
00154     vector<string> ptype;
00155     ptype.push_back("electrons"); ptype.push_back("photons");
00156     ptype.push_back("positrons"); ptype.push_back("all");
00157     ptype.push_back("charged");
00158     particle_type = input->getInput("particle type",ptype,3)-1;
00159     vector<int> the_filter; vector<string> the_latch;
00160     err = input->getInput("filter type",the_filter);
00161     int err1 = input->getInput("latch setting",the_latch);
00162     if( !err && !err1 ) {
00163         if( the_filter[0] >= 0 && the_filter[0] <= 3 ) {
00164             int nbit1 = the_latch[0].size(); int nbit2 = 0;
00165             if( !the_filter[0] ) nbit2 = the_latch[1].size();
00166             if( nbit1 + nbit2 > 0 ) {
00167                 int *the_bits = new int [nbit1+nbit2];
00168                 for(int j=0; j<nbit1+nbit2; j++) {
00169                     if( j < nbit1 ) the_bits[j]=(int) (the_latch[0][j] == '1');
00170                     else the_bits[j] = (int) (the_latch[1][j-nbit1] == '1');
00171                 }
00172                 setFilter(the_filter[0],nbit1,nbit2,the_bits);
00173                 delete [] the_bits;
00174             }
00175         }
00176     }
00177     vector<EGS_Float> wwindow;
00178     err = input->getInput("weight window",wwindow);
00179     if( !err && wwindow.size() == 2 ) {
00180         wmin = wwindow[0]; wmax = wwindow[1];
00181     }
00182     int ntmp; err = input->getInput("reuse photons",ntmp);
00183     if( !err && ntmp > 0 ) Nreuse_g = ntmp;
00184     err = input->getInput("reuse electrons",ntmp);
00185     if( !err && ntmp > 0 ) Nreuse_e = ntmp;
00186     description = "Phase space source from "; description += the_file_name;
00187 }
00188 
00189 EGS_I64 EGS_PhspSource::getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *, int &q,
00190     int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt, EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00191     if( !recl ) egsFatal("EGS_PhspSource::readParticle(): the file is not "
00192             "open yet\n");
00193     /*
00194     if( Nuse >= Nreuse ) {
00195         do { readParticle(); } while ( rejectParticle() );
00196     }
00197     */
00198     if( Nuse >= Nreuse ) readParticle();
00199     x.x = p.x; x.y = p.y; x.z = 0;
00200     u.x = p.u; u.y = p.v;
00201     EGS_Float aux = p.u*p.u+p.v*p.v;
00202     if( aux < 1 ) aux = sqrt(1-aux); else aux = 0;
00203     if( p.wt > 0 ) { u.z = aux; wt = p.wt; } else { u.z = -aux; wt = -p.wt; }
00204     if( rejectParticle() ) wt = 0;
00205     E = p.E; q = p.q; latch = 0; //latch = p.latch;
00206     ++Nuse;
00207     return count;
00208 }

00210 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00211 
00215 union __egs_data32 {
00216     int   i;
00217     float f;
00218     char  c[4];
00219 };
00220 #endif

00222 void EGS_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(EGS_I64 nstart, EGS_I64 nrun) {
00223     if( nstart < 0 || nrun < 1 || nstart + nrun > Nparticle ) {
00224         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::setSimulationChunk(): illegal attempt "
00225             "to set the simulation chunk between %lld and %lld ignored\n",
00226             nstart+1,nstart+nrun); return;
00227     }
00228     Nfirst = nstart+1; Nlast = nstart + nrun; Npos = nstart;
00229     istream::off_type pos = Nfirst*recl;
00230     the_file.seekg(pos,ios::beg);
00231     egsInformation("EGS_PhspSource: using phsp portion between %lld and %lld\n",
00232             Nfirst,Nlast);
00233 }
00234 
00235 void EGS_PhspSource::readParticle() {
00236     if( (++Npos) > Nlast ) {
00237         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::readParticle(): reached the end of the "
00238                "phase space file chunk (%lld)\n  will start from the beginning "
00239                "of the chunk (%lld) but this "
00240                "implies that uncertainty estimates will be inaccurate\n",
00241                Nlast,Nfirst);
00242         the_file.seekg(recl,ios::beg); Nrecycle++; Npos = Nfirst;
00243     }
00244     the_file.read(record,recl*sizeof(char)); ++Nread;
00245     if( the_file.eof() || !the_file.good() )
00246         egsFatal("EGS_PhspSource::readParticle(): I/O error while reading "
00247                 "phase space file\n");
00248     __egs_data32 *data;
00249     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[0];  p.latch = data->i;
00250     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[4];  p.E = data->f;
00251     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[8];  p.x = data->f;
00252     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[12]; p.y = data->f;
00253     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[16]; p.u = data->f;
00254     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[20]; p.v = data->f;
00255     data = (__egs_data32 *) &record[24]; p.wt = data->f;
00256     if( swap_bytes ) {
00257         egsSwapBytes(&p.latch); egsSwapBytes(&p.E); egsSwapBytes(&p.wt);
00258         egsSwapBytes(&p.x); egsSwapBytes(&p.y);
00259         egsSwapBytes(&p.u); egsSwapBytes(&p.v);
00260     }
00261     if( p.latch & 1073741824 ) p.q = -1;
00262     else if( p.latch & 536870912 ) p.q = 1;
00263     else p.q = 0;
00264     if( p.E < 0 ) { count++; p.E = -p.E; }
00265     else if( first ) ++count;
00266     first = false;
00267     if( p.q ) { p.E -= 0.5110034; Nreuse = Nreuse_e; }
00268     else Nreuse = Nreuse_g;
00269     Nuse = 0; p.wt /= Nreuse;
00270 }
00271 
00272 bool EGS_PhspSource::rejectParticle() const {
00273     if( particle_type < 2 && p.q != particle_type ) return true;
00274     if( particle_type == 3 && !p.q ) return true;
00275     if( p.x < Xmin || p.x > Xmax || p.y < Ymin || p.y > Ymax ) return true;
00276     if( p.wt < wmin || p.wt > wmax ) return true;
00277     if( p.latch & 2147483648UL ) return true;
00278     if( filter_type < 0 ) return false;
00279     if( filter_type == 0 ) {
00280         bool r1; if( filter1 ) r1 = !(p.latch & filter1); else r1 = false;
00281         bool r2 = (p.latch & filter2);
00282         return (r1 || r2);
00283     }
00284     if( filter_type == 1 ) return (p.latch & filter1);
00285     int l = p.latch >> 24; bool res = l & filter1;
00286     return filter_type == 3 ? res : !res;
00287 }
00288 
00289 void EGS_PhspSource::setFilter(int type, int nbit1, int nbit2, const int *bits){
00290     if( type < 0 || type > 3 ) {
00291         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::setFilter: invalid filter type %d\n",type);
00292         return;
00293     }
00294     int ntot = nbit1; if( type == 0 ) ntot += nbit2;
00295     if( ntot > 29 ) {
00296         egsWarning("EGS_PhspSource::setFilter: maximum number of bits is "
00297              "limited to 29, you requested %d\n",ntot);
00298         return;
00299     }
00300     if( !ntot ) return;
00301     filter_type = type;
00302     if ( filter_type == 0 ) {
00303         int i; filter1 = 0; filter2 = 0;
00304         for(i=0; i<ntot; i++) {
00305             if( bits[i] ) {
00306                 unsigned int aux = 1; aux = (aux << i);
00307                 if( i < nbit1 ) filter1 += aux; else filter2 += aux;
00308             }
00309         }
00310     }
00311     else if( filter_type == 1 ) { // TODO
00312     }
00313     else if( filter_type == 2 ) { // TODO
00314     }
00315     else if( filter_type == 3 ) { // TODO
00316     }
00317 }
